hero-desc-1-2: I'm fueled by a passion for IT, seeking to specialize in systems administration and DevOps, building resilient, automated infrastructures.
hero-desc-2: As a Computer Science student I'm committed to continuous learning and daily growth.
hero-desc-3: I'm available for freelance projects and collaborations, let's tackle your next challenge together!
miners-desc: Minecraft community, created to support server owners and administrators providing free tools to facilitate development.
docs-desc: Public documentation, created for and by the Minecraft community, with a wide range of guides and tutorials, all available on Github with open contributions.
syncr-desc: In development web application to replicate, move and sync remotes (S3 and SFTP), made with Django and Rclone.
stack-desc: Languages and tools that I worked with, in order of knowledge by category.
education-desc: Advancing my knowledge through studies, courses and certifications.
upf-title: Computer Science | University of Passo Fundo
upf-desc: Exploring the computing achitecture and principles, applying academic rigor to my projects and the real-world.
ckac-desc: Preparation and content for the CKA Certification, with Kubernetes cluster administration, design, testing, building and networking.
zab-desc: Basic understanding of monitoring Linux and Windows machines and applications with Zabbix.
kab-desc: Basic understanding of Kubernetes Fundamentals, Configuration and Deployment.
fbe-desc: Understanding of backend communication patterns, protocols, execution and proxying.
djm-desc: Fundamentals of Django, REST framework, customization and design patterns.
cka-desc: Demonstrated the ability to do basic installation as well as configuring and managing production-grade Kubernetes clusters.
services-game-desc: Whether it's for your game server, hosting company, or whatever you need. Perfectly tailored to your requirements, any hardware, any location, whenever you want.
services-app-desc: Your applications need a place to be online! I will create hosting solutions that meet all your needs, keeping them always available and running in the best possible way.
services-panel-desc: For all categories and needs, from extensive monitoring with Grafana and Prometheus or Zabbix, hypervisors for virtual machines like Proxmox, Virtfusion and Virtualizor to finance like WHMCS.
services-backups-desc: Backups are worthless if they are not tested or follow the 3-2-1 rule! I will set up backup and disaster recovery, across multiple providers and locations, any way you want!
services-custom-desc: We can negotiate any installation, configuration, maintenance or managed service that meets your requirements! Just get in touch!
tryxia-desc: Free hosting for Minecraft, previously for files. Created to acquire more knowledge about the area, ways to react and act in different situations. It was canceled due to lack of funds.
cta-desc: I'm always availiable on Discord and via email!
name: Name:
psa-design: I apologize for the website design, I work with backend, not frontend
form-inside-title: Leave me a message and I will respond as soon as possible!
form-socials: You can also get in touch through my networks:
form-status-success: Your message has been sent successfully!
